data.name: Beyond Horizon
data.detailed_description:
Beyond Horizon is an atmospheric adventure game set on an exoplanet.

Control a rover and explore this mysterious and distant world.

In the near future (end of 21st century) humanity sends many probes to different parts of the galaxy as a last-ditch effort to find suitable planets for colonisation.

The situation on Earth becomes more desperate day after day, as the political tensions and climate change rack up.
data.about_the_game:

The situation on Earth becomes more desperate day after day, as the political tensions and climate change rack up.
data.short_description: Control a rover and explore the mysterious and distant world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 1030
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Inter Core i5 10th Gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OSX 11.4+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Graphics: Integrated Intel Iris
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Linux-based OS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2GB of VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
